name: StarRocks
description: This Test Connection validates the access against the database and basic metadata extraction of schemas and tables.

steps.name: CheckAccess
steps.description: Validate that we can properly reach the database and authenticate with the given credentials.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to connect to StarRocks, please validate the credentials

steps.name: GetSchemas
steps.description: List all the schemas available to the user.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch schemas, please validate if the user has enough privilege to fetch schemas.

steps.name: GetTables
steps.description: From a given schema, list the tables belonging to that schema. If no schema is specified, we'll list the tables of a random schema.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch tables, please validate if the user has enough privilege to fetch tables.

steps.name: GetViews
steps.description: From a given schema, list the views belonging to that schema. If no schema is specified, we'll list the tables of a random schema.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch views, please validate if the user has enough privilege to fetch views.

steps.name: GetQueries
steps.description: Validate access to the StarRocks audit log table (starrocks_audit_db__.starrocks_audit_tbl__) for lineage and usage extraction.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to access audit logs. Ensure the FE audit log plugin is enabled and the user has SELECT privilege on starrocks_audit_db__.starrocks_audit_tbl__.
